biquad.name: Biquad Filter
biquad.description: Biquad filter based on Audio EQ Cookbook

movingAverage.name: Moving Average Filter
movingAverage.description: The simplest lowpass FIR filter that outputs the average of the past N samples. Used for noise reduction and smoothing.

butterworth.name: Butterworth Filter
butterworth.description: IIR filter with maximally flat magnitude response in the passband. Features monotonic attenuation and nearly linear phase response.

sinc.name: Sinc Filter
sinc.description: FIR filter based on ideal low-pass filter impulse response. Uses truncated sinc function.

gaussian.name: Gaussian Filter
gaussian.description: FIR filter based on Gaussian function. Features smooth frequency response.

references.title: References
references.audioEqCookbook: Standard reference for biquad filter design equations. Provides coefficient calculation formulas for various filter types (LPF, HPF, BPF, Notch, etc.) using the Bilinear Transform.
references.controlSystemsAcademy: Educational site for learning Bode plot changes through interactive pole-zero placement. Visualizes the relationship between pole-zero movement on the complex plane and transfer functions.
references.falstadFilter: Digital filter simulator by Paul Falstad. Real-time visualization of pole-zero placement, frequency response, impulse response, and more.
